nodes.text: Hizram Riean was a bounty hunter.

Sometime following 0 BBY, a spacer working for Bib Fortuna led Romo Vax to Jabba's Palace. Unbeknownst to the spacer however, Romo was being pursued by Hizram Riean, a ruthless bounty hunter. Bib Fortuna, not amused by these turn of events, gave the spacer one chance to find and eliminate the bounty hunter before he reached Romo Vax. Not wishing to face Jabba's wrath, the spacer agreed to the task.
By now, Hizram Riean and two of his thugs were already nearing Jabba's Palace. Yet the spacer reached them in time, and managed to eliminate both thugs, as well as Hizram.

Hizram Riean was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the
MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. He was part of a series of quests, collectively referred to as "Jabba's Themepark." Bib Fortuna would task players with killing Hizram, before he reached Romo Vax. Ultimately, Hizram Riean was removed from the game when "Jabba's Themepark" underwent a drastic overhaul during the so-called "New Game Enhancements" of 2005.
